disable.description: You do not currently have two-step verification enabled on your account

enable.description: Two-step verification is currently enabled on your account

success.title: Two-Step Authentication Enabled
success.description: Store the codes below somewhere safe. If you lose access to your phone you can use these backup codes to sign in. These codes will not be shown again.
success.copied: Copied the recovery codes to clipboard

form.title: Enable Two-Step Verification
form.description: Help protect your account from unauthorized access. You'll be prompted for a verification code each time you sign in.

qr.copied: Copied the authentication code to clipboard
qr.instructions: Scan the QR code above using the two-step authentication app of your choice. Then, enter the 6-digit code generated into the field below.
